name: Absurd
description:
'''Absurd''' is a German [[black metal]] band that has been classified as a "[[right-wing extremist]]" group by the [[Thuringia]]n [[Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution|Landesbehörde für Verfassungsschutz]].

Their lyrics concern nationalistic, pagan (Hendrik Möbus is the founder of the [[Deutsche Heidnische Front]]), pro-heathen [[Germanic Neopaganism|revivalist Germanic]], and anti-[[Judeo-Christian]] themes.
